channel.title: Uncategorized – CA Photo
channel.description: Bolton based wedding and portrait photography

item.title: Start of school deal – free sittings
item.dc:creator: Cat
item.description: It’s that time of year again – back to school! Wouldn’t you like to capture that great memory of the summer or sweet photo to send to Gran? Here at CA Photo we’d like to offer you a portrait session for free (worth £50). All you have to do is book a portrait session before […]
item.content:encoded:
It’s that time of year again – back to school! Wouldn’t you like to capture that great memory of the summer or sweet photo to send to Gran?

Here at CA Photo we’d like to offer you a portrait session for free (worth £50). All you have to do is book a portrait session before 19th September.

Contact us to arrange a booking!
